$comment: This is a schema for the DHT REPRESENTATION of vf:Process; inputs & outputs are stored in a separate Links type.  In input/output to the web API, inputs & outputs appear as arrays of hashes.
title: Process
description: A grouping of input and output events

processClassifiedAs.description: A ProcessClassification that classifies this Process

isFinished.description: Is the process complete, or is it possible that the events will change?

name.description: A simple name, not necessarily unique

url.description: A URL where additional information can be obtained

image.description: A URL that points to an image of the object
